summary: A 2012 stand-up clip of Robin Williams joking about Donald Trump has resurfaced on social media, gaining significant attention. The clip features Williams criticizing Trump's involvement in beauty pageants and his business dealings. The video has gone viral, with many users drawing parallels between Trump's relationship with convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein and Williams' jokes. The timing of the clip's resurfacing is notable, given the recent release of the Epstein Files and the scrutiny surrounding Trump's relationship with Epstein. The clip has sparked a renewed conversation about Trump's past actions and associations. Williams' jokes have been seen as a warning about Trump's character, with many wishing that his words had been heeded at the time.
